article_title: Boys basketball: West Las Vegas advances to title game of Stu Clark Tournament
article_text:

og.description: After West Las Vegas dispatched Bernalillo 65-47 on Saturday night, Albuquerque St. Pius X will be the next team to try to give the Dons their first loss of the season.
